page.syntax: Record_List as C = top_records_list(C order ,N count [,C filter])

argument.name: Record_List
argument.description: A list of the record numbers from the current table.

argument.name: order
argument.description: Optional. Default = "" (record number order). A character order expression that sorts selected records.

argument.name: count
argument.description: A integer number, representing the number of the table's records to retrieve. Numeric

argument.name: filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects records from the table.

page.discussion: The TOP_RECORDS_LIST() function returns a list of the record numbers from the current table of the first percent records as defined the Order_Expn and Filter_Expn arguments. This function should be run from an open layout.
page.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") ? top_records_list("lastname", 10) = "32 56 55 52 54 18 48 8 51 20"
